name: Frontier e-HR
description: Founded in the year 2000, our founders foresaw massive cost savings and the streamlining of processes through the accelerated adoption of internet platform for business software. With a humble beginning of only a few founding members, fusing passion with the expertise in web-based development and knowledge in HR domain, Frontier e-HR was born. Since then, our operational growth has been self-sustained and funded organically, without any external injection of cash. Over the years, our company has gone from strength to strength with a good track record of delivering value to our clients, growing profitability and increasing shareholders’ value.

enhanced_description: Frontier e-HR, established in 2000, is an HR technology company specializing in cloud-based and on-premise HR software solutions. The platform offers a comprehensive Human Resource Management System (HRMS) designed to streamline processes and achieve cost savings. It encompasses core HR functionalities such as HRMS, talent management, and workforce management, with capabilities for global HRMS integration. Key features include payroll processing, performance management, applicant tracking, leave, claim, time attendance, and HR analytics. The system also supports total rewards functions like benefits administration, corporate wellness, compensation management, employee recognition, and sales compensation. Frontier e-HR aims to improve employee happiness and engagement, and its software adheres to high security standards, being SOC 2 certified and PCI compliant.
